metadata.Title: CVE-2020-10736 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An authorization bypass vulnerability was found in Ceph versions 15.2.0before 15.2.2, where the ceph-mon and ceph-mgr daemons do not properlyrestrict access, resulting in gaining access to unauthorized resources.This flaw allows an authenticated client to modify the configuration andpossibly conduct further attacks.

criterions.comment: ceph: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
